data.actual_result: the app crashes (the screen goes black for a short moment and then I'm back on my homescreen)
data.expected_result: it should open the share sheet where I can choose my password manager to automatically enter my credentials
data.short_description: Tapping the 1Password icon to login crashes the app (only on iPad, not iPhone)
data.steps_to_repro: - When not logged in tap on login - Tap the 1Password icon at the right of the password field
